overview: The cooking channels top cupcake finals are fierce. Asa's nice at the end, but Diamond's being hot and mean. The judging turns out to be rigged. The ladies vent their frustrations on each other's pussies!  Bonnie's retiring and handing over her studio to a new dominatrix. Skin Diamond shows up and disrespects Bonnie. They whip out all their toys and stretch each other's holes and fucking to horny new heights of pleasure!  Officer Veracruz needs some new leads in a case and heads down to gang owned strip[ club to get some answers. When she questions a stripper names Summer, her bribe buys her a lot more than information!
title: Hot and Mean 10
